alert.note: Alert for Alcorn; Tippah (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 09 at 4:18PM CST until December 09 at 4:45PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM CST FOR NORTHERN TIPPAH...NORTHWESTERN ALCORN AND SOUTHWESTERN MCNAIRY COUNTIES... At 418 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Theo, or 8 miles southwest of Big Hill Pond State Park, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Corinth, Big Hill Pond State Park, Theo, Walnut, Eastview, Falkner, Guys, Ramer, Kossuth, Chalybeate, Allentown, Wenasoga, Biggersville, Crumtown, Jobes, Brownfield, Gift, Lone Pine, Cypress, and Chewalla. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for northeastern Mississippi...and west Tennessee. Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the storm shelter or small central room in a sturdy structure. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
